titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR (PENETRATIVE SEX MALE SAME SEX PARTNERS IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS) - Description

div.p: CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR (PENETRATIVE SEX MALE SAME SEX PARTNERS IN THE LAST THREE MONTHS) is the same as attribute CONDOMLESS SEX INDICATOR, for penetrative sex with male same sex partners in the last three months.
